properties.name: jwt.expiration
properties.description: Time for the JWT token to expire

properties.name: jwt.secret
properties.description: Secret key for signing JWT tokens

properties.name: jwt.refresh-expiration
properties.description: Time for the refresh token to expire

properties.name: admin.username
properties.description: Admin username for initial user creation

properties.name: admin.email
properties.description: Admin email for initial user creation

properties.name: admin.password
properties.description: Admin password for initial user creation

properties.name: email.verification.token.expiration
properties.description: Time for the verification email token to expire

properties.name: app.client.url
properties.description: Base URL of the client application

properties.name: cors.allowed-origins
properties.description: Comma-separated list of allowed origins for CORS

properties.name: jwt.cookie.name
properties.description: Cookie name for storing refresh token

properties.name: jwt.cookie.domain
properties.description: Cookie domain (optional, leave empty to use request domain)

properties.name: bgg.csv.url
properties.description: URL to download the BGG CSV file from

properties.name: bgg.csv.local.path
properties.description: Local file path to store the BGG CSV file

properties.name: bgg.csv.delete-after-import
properties.description: Flag to delete the local CSV file after import
